feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [GRA1][RTvRack] - Upgrade xDC/xBU
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 17, 21:00 - 23:59 UTC

Mar 10, 01:06 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 17/03/2022 21:00 UTC
End time : 17/03/2022 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : In regards to our lifecycle management, we need to upgrade our exchangers RTvRack in order to have a homogeneous park

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - LIM0313B01B
entry.content:
Mar 13, 09:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/03/2022 09:34 UTC
End Time : 13/03/2022 10:07 UTC
Service impact : Following a leak, all rack LIM0313B01B has been shutdown to prevent more damage.
Root cause : Water leak in our cooling system.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated servers] - G264B12
entry.content:
Mar 12, 12:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/03/2022 07:16 UTC
End Time : 12/03/2022 11:54 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak in the cooling system of the rack.

Mar 12, 09:43 UTC
Update - 1 servers are available again.
A second server is being restarted, and the last server is still in the hands of our technicians to be put back into service as soon as possible.

We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Mar 12, 07:47 UTC
Identified - Start time : 12/03/2022 07:16 UTC
Service impact : 3 servers down on rack G264B12.
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak in the cooling system of the rack.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently replacing the damaged hardware.

entry.title: [RBX7][Dedicated Servers] - R717B12 / R717B10 / R717B15 / R717B14
entry.content:
Mar 12, 08:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 16/03/2022 08:02 UTC
End Time : 16/03/2022 08:05 UTC
Service impact : Racks R717B12 / R717B10 / R717B15 / R717B14 were impacted.
Root cause : The incident was due to a circuit breaker tripping.

entry.title: [US][BACKBONE] - Dallas US POP Down
entry.content:
Mar 12, 02:35 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/03/2022 23:23 UTC
End Time : 12/03/2022 00:25 UTC
Service impact : All the devices in Dallas POP were unreachable, they are up now.

Mar 11, 23:54 UTC
Update - Update : All the devices in Dallas POP were unreachable, they are coming to normal slowly and ou team still investigating the cause of this issue.

Mar 11, 23:50 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/03/2022 23:23 UTC
Service impact : degradation service all DC US
Ongoing actions : Our team is currently investigating the cause.

entry.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - GRA0316A03A
entry.content:
Mar 11, 22:26 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/03/2022 16:53 UTC
End Time : 11/03/2022 22:16 UTC
Service impacted : Vrack were unreachable
Root cause : A failure on the switch was causing this incident. Our team made a replacement of the switch, now the service came to normal.

Mar 11, 18:12 UTC
Update - Ongoing actions : Our teams are replacing the defected switch causing the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Mar 11, 17:38 UTC
Identified - Start time : 11/03/2022 16:53 UTC

Root cause : A network equipment is causing the incident.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently working to solve the problem.

entry.content:
Mar 11, 09:23 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 11/03/2022 08:32 UTC
End Time : 11/03/2022 09:23 UTC
Service impact : All the servers of the rack are functional

Mar 11, 08:52 UTC
Identified - Service impact : Most of the servers are back to normal.
One last server is being analyzed by our technical teams

Mar 11, 08:47 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/03/2022 08:32 UTC
Service impact : Following an incident on the cooling system, servers are no longer functional on the rack
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are currently investigating to restore the servers

entry.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - T01C19
entry.content:
Mar 11, 08:41 UTC
Resolved - All servers in the T01C19 rack are functional

Start Time : 11/03/2022 07:14 UTC
End Time : 11/03/2022 08:40 UTC
Root cause : The switch connected to the rack had a hardware failure

Mar 11, 08:01 UTC
Identified - Service impact : Equipments in rack T01C19 is no longer connected to the public network
Root cause : The switch connected to the rack had a hardware failure
Ongoing actions : Our teams proceed to the replacement of the equipment
Time to resolution : We estimate the time to replace the switch at 45 minutes

Mar 11, 07:26 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/03/2022 07:14 UTC
Service impact : Dedicated servers are unreachable in this rack
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams investigate to determine the origin of the loss of access
